title: Validate Metric summary DOES NOT reset to 0 ; if Failure to send to GEF
custom_steps:
- Simulate to FAIL connection to GEF either by blocing port 50051 or host resolution failure 
- Make few email transaction to update metrics 
- verify new metric counts adds up
- Revert changes to be able to send GEF retry
custom_expected:
- If SMTPProxy fail to send the metrics to GEF, the count should be kept as it is and should be send on the next interval.
- New values will get added to it.
